reviews.text: Metroplex Pool did an incredible job from start to finish! They installed our Latham fiberglass pool, handled all the concrete decking, and finished everything off with a beautiful spray deck texture. The entire process was seamless — great communication, attention to detail, and excellent craftsmanship. We couldn’t be happier with how everything turned out and highly recommend them to anyone looking to add a pool or upgrade their backyard!

I highly recommend Metroplex Pool to anyone seeking a top-tier, reliable pool company – Steven and his crew consistently deliver excellence.

We had a great experience using Metroplex Pools. Installation went smoothly. The crew that came out with the equipment to dig were very knowledgeable. It was tight getting our pool in because of a big tree in our yard, but it went very well. We were swimming in our pool within three weeks. As part of getting a pool, they explain how to completely take care of it. If you need to call with a question, they’re always available. I would highly recommend them.

Love our pool!  Recommendations from Steve and the install crew were spot on.  I know we may be an exception but installed and concrete work done from start to finish in 9 days!!! Dustin's crew were the best and never hesitated answering any questions we had on the installation process.  Felix did an excellent job on the concrete. Out in the country we don't need inspections so that helped the processes!  Very responsive to all questions and concerns.

28 days from start of dig to jumping in, would have been 14 but rain delayed inspections and digging. Fantastic Job!

Let me start with the owner, Steve. I spoke with 4 different pool builders and decided to go with Metroplex Pools after speaking with him, Steve is just honest about what he can do for you and very knowledgeable when it comes to fiberglass pools, I researched them and found others giving me information that sent warning bells off, Steve knows how to install fiberglass correctly!

Metroplex Pools is dedicated to making their customers happy. Our experience started a bit rocky, but they turned things around and finished with amazing results! Erika and Ivan went the extra mile to ensure we loved our pool. We know we weren’t the easiest clients, but they handled everything with professionalism and care. We’re thrilled with how our pool turned out!

Being our first pool, Metroplex Pools has been amazing to work with. From picking out our pool to picking the colors and the communication was outstanding. The whole process took almost a month and an half with the delaying being the permit. The whole team was so nice to work with. My family could not be more pleased with the outcome.

I had my pool installed by Metroplex Pool last summer, and the experience has been fantastic from start to finish. They helped me create a true backyard oasis that I’ve enjoyed all season long.
The entire process was smooth and well-organized. The team kept me informed at every step, making sure I understood what was happening and what to expect next. What really stands out, though, is their continued support even after the pool was completed. They’ve always been available to answer my questions
